column2: The following Children need an Education Focus:\n$LIST$
The following adult sons do not hold any land:\n$LIST$
The following adventurers are targeting me:\n$LIST$
We can ask the following allies to support us:\n$LIST$
As a §Y$RELIGION$ Pagan§!, you lose §R$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige every month for being at peace and doing no raiding.
§YYou have been at peace for too long!§!
The following important Decisions are available:\n$LIST$
The following Special Minor Titles can be granted:\n$LIST$
The following Plots have become available:\n$LIST$
The following Special Holding Actions are available:\n$LIST$
The following Special Character Actions are available:\n$LIST$
The following Special Title Actions are available:\n$LIST$
As a participant in the ongoing Crusade, a beneficiary should be selected so that when the inevitable victory occurs, our dynasty may share in the spoils.
The following betrothed characters can get married:\n$LIST$
The following vassals can join our war against our former liege:\n$LIST$
§YWe can call in vassals of our former liege§!
Can call vassals of former liege
You can imprison subjects without incurring tyranny. Note that an empowered council might still object.\n$LIST$
The following Weak Claims can be pressed:\n$LIST$
The §Y$RELIGION$§! faith can be reformed into an organized religion
You have enough Technology Points in a Technology Group to invest in any of its advances
§YYou should Invest in a Technological Advance§!
The following Children need a Childhood Focus:\n$LIST$
When an epidemic is threatening your court, you can shut the gates. Characters in seclusion will have a hard time communicating with the outside world but should avoid infection from outside sources.

A [Root.Religion.GetName] ruler who has not been officially crowned by a notable member of the Church will never be fully accepted by [Root.GetHerHis] vassals as legitimate.\nThe more years an adult [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitle] wastes before being anointed, the more likely [Root.GetHerHis] vassals will be to doubt the validity of [Root.GetHerHis] divine right to rule.

Your Council has been Discontent for $DISCONTENT_DURATION|Y$ month(s), and will be until §Y$DISCONTENT_END_DATE$§!. This means that if Councilors were prohibited by law from forming and joining factions, they may now do so. This could potentially destabilize the realm.
The following councilors are currently not on a job:\n$LIST$\n§GClick to go to Court View§!
The following spots need to be filled:\n$LIST$\n§GClick to go to Court View§!
You have decadent relatives. You should ask them to straighten up or in other ways take care of them.
Your coffers are empty and you owe your subjects money. The morale of your armies will suffer, and the longer this goes on, the more corruption and criminals will plague your counties.
The following de jure ducal claims can be pressed: $LIST$
§YYou can Press de jure Ducal Claims§!
Your demesne has §Y$NUM$§!/§Y$MAX$§! holdings, causing inefficient taxation, troop recruitment and resentment among your vassals.
Enemy rulers are preparing invasions against us:\n$LIST$

The following Characters owe you a Favor:
$LIST$

Favors can be used for the following:
$ACTIONS$
$HEIR$ should get married\n§GClick to go to Character View§!

Effects of §YThreat§!:

- With over $COALITION_INFAMY_LIMIT|%Y0$ §YThreat§! other realms can form §YDefensive Pacts§! to protect themselves from you. Each religious group has their own separate §YDefensive Pact§! and will only defend members belonging to that same §YDefensive Pact§!.

- With over $OTHER_COALITION_JOIN_INFAMY|%Y0$ §YThreat§! all §YDefensive Pacts§! of other religious groups band together if you attack one of them.

- With over $EVERY_COALITION_EXCEPT_HEADS_JOIN_INFAMY|%Y0$ §YThreat§! all §YDefensive Pacts§! including that of your own religious group will band together if you attack one of them.

- With over $EVERY_COALITION_JOIN_INFAMY|%Y0$ §YThreat§! you are considered threatening enough that even your own religious head and holy orders from your religious group will defend other §YDefensive Pacts§! from you.

- As your §YThreat§! increases, larger and more distant realms are allowed to join the §YDefensive Pacts§! opposing you.

- As your §YThreat§! decreases, larger or more distant realms are forced to leave the §YDefensive Pacts§! opposing you.

--------------
§YThreat§! will decline slowly over time but you can manually lower it by granting independence to land not part of your De Jure realm.
A Crusade is targeting our religion. We should consider how to best defend against it.
You have too many holdings in your personal demesne. As a nomad you can only have one holding without penalties. However you might want to keep the land yourself so you can pillage it...$LIST$

Your Liege's Council has been Discontent for $DISCONTENT_DURATION$ month(s), and will be until §Y$DISCONTENT_END_DATE$§!. This means that if Councilors were prohibited by law from forming and joining Factions, they may now do so. This could potentially destabilize the realm.
The following titles will be lost on succession:\n$LIST$
Your Council has declared that peace shall rule the realm! \nYour vassals are unable to wage war on each other for another $MONTHS|Y$ months!
Your Council has declared that peace shall rule the realm! \nYour vassals are unable to wage war on each other for another $DAYS|Y$ days!
Your Council has declared that peace shall rule the realm! \nAll internal wars waged between your vassals will end with a §YWhite Peace§! in $MONTHS|Y$ months!
Your Council has declared that peace shall rule the realm! \nAll internal wars waged between your vassals will end with a §YWhite Peace§! in $DAYS|Y$ days!
My Realm will soon be at Peace
You should pick a Focus for your character
If your ruler dies now the game will end!
Unless we construct a §YCastle§! or §YCity§! in the following Counties, they will revert to Nomad control on Succession:\n$LIST$
Unless we have at least §Y$NUM$§! Buildings in the Tribal Holdings of the following Counties, they will revert to Nomad control on Succession:\n$LIST$
Your heir, $HEIR$, currently follows a religion you are not allowed to play. Upon succession they will convert to the religion of your previous character.
There is currently an ongoing war between the Teutons and the pagans
You can ask the Teutons to target a pagan ruler for their northern campaigns
When you feel safe you can reopen your gates and welcome the outside world once again.
You have §R$NUM$§!/§Y$MAX$§! Clans, giving you a Clan Sentiment penalty towards all Clan vassals.
You have §R$NUM$§!/§Y$MAX$§! vassals, giving you less taxes and levies from your vassals. You risk losing vassals if your character dies.

Depending on your circumstances, you might want to '§YCreate New Vassal§!' in the Holding menu, or give the title away.

The following Holdings are of the wrong type:
$LIST$
Wrong type of holding in demesne
The Council of $LIEGE|Y$ has declared that peace shall reign in all the realm! \nVassals of $LIEGE|Y$ are unable to wage war on each other for another $MONTHS|Y$ months!
The Council of $LIEGE|Y$ has declared that peace shall rein in all the realm! \nVassals of $LIEGE|Y$ are unable to wage war on each other for another $DAYS|Y$ days!

The Council of $LIEGE|Y$ has declared that peace shall reign in all the realm! 
All internal wars waged between vassals of $LIEGE|Y$ will end with a §YWhite Peace§! in $MONTHS|Y$ months!

If you are on the Council you can call in a §YFavor§! from $LIEGE|Y$ to prevent the §YRealm Peace§! from being enforced.

The Council of $LIEGE|Y$ has declared that peace shall rein in all the realm! 
All internal wars waged between vassals of $LIEGE|Y$ will end with a §YWhite Peace§! in $DAYS|Y$ days!

If you are on the Council you can call in a §YFavor§! from $LIEGE|Y$ to prevent the §YRealm Peace§! from being enforced.
We are preparing to invade §Y$TARGET$§! before §Y$DATE$§!
There are powerful dissident Factions in your realm:\n$LIST$
There is currently an ongoing Reconquest war at the Iberian Peninsula
You have until [Root.reconquista_preparation_left.GetExpiryDate] to declare a Reconquest War
The following counties run a risk of having a revolt:\n$LIST$
You should get married\n§GClick to go to Character View§!
The following children need a guardian:\n$LIST$
You should nominate successors for these titles:\n$LIST$
You have gained enough influence within your society that you can request promotion to the next rank.
There are vassals with worrisome lines of succession.\nOn death, their titles might pass from your Realm:\n$LIST$

You hold too much land compared to the other Clans. Hand out §Y$NUM$§! counties or you might face revolts from the existing Clans as it negatively affects their §YClan Sentiment§! of you. You can also face a §YMinor Clan Rising§! revolt to seize its rightful position among the major Clans...
The following Vassals are upset about their levies:\n$LIST$
